meanings.definition: Having a rounded or bulging shape.
meanings.sent1: The bausond pumpkin looked perfect for carving.
meanings.sent2: She admired the bausond clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The bausond balloon floated gracefully in the air.
meanings.sent4: The bausond hills rolled gently in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The bausond cheeks of the baby made everyone smile.

meanings.definition: A rounded or bulging part or feature.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a bausond of frosting on top.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the bausond of the doorknob as he entered.
meanings.sent3: The bausond of the basketball made it bounce unpredictably.
meanings.sent4: The bausond of the tree trunk provided a comfortable seat.
meanings.sent5: The bausond of the vase made it stand out among the others.
